    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">

          <title>
            <string language="ca">Com funcionen els condicionals? First Conditional</string>
            <string language="en">How do you use the conditionals in English?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wie verwenden Sie die conditionals auf englisch?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Comment utilisez-vous les conditionals en anglais
?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Como você usa os conditionals em inglês?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Come usate i conditionals in inglese?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πώς χρησιμοποιείτε τα conditionals στα αγγλικά;</string>
          </title>
          <language>ca</language>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="ca">Miniunitat didàctica (MUD) interactiva que treballa el primer condicional en anglès mitjançant diferents exercicis i jocs.</string>
            <string language="en">Interactive mini teaching unit (MUD) on the use of the first conditional in English using different exercises and games.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">llengua anglesa</string>
            <string language="en">English language</string>
            <string language="es">lengua inglesa</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">gramàtica</string>
            <string language="en">grammar</string>
            <string language="es">gramática</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">lectura</string>
            <string language="en">reading</string>
            <string language="es">lectura</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Interaktive unterrichtende Minimaßeinheit (SCHLAMM) auf 
dem Gebrauch von dem ersten Konditional in den englischen verwendenden
unterschiedlichen Übungen und in den Spielen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Mini unité d'enseignement interactive (BOUE) sur 
l'utilisation du premier conditionnel dans différents exercices et 
jeux d'utilisation anglais.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Unidade ensinando mini interativa (LAMA) no uso do 
primeiro condicional em exercícios e em jogos diferentes usando-se 
ingleses.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Mini unità d'istruzione interattiva (FANGO) sull'uso del 
primo condizionale nelle esercitazioni e nei giochi differenti usando 
inglesi.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Διαλογική μίνι μονάδα διδασκαλίας (ΛΑΣΠΗ) στη χρήση 
πρώτου του υπό όρους στα αγγλικά που χρησιμοποιούν τις 
διαφορετικά ασκήσεις και τα παιχνίδια.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Englische Sprache</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Grammatik</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Messwert</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
